uk.ac.ebi.ontoapi.bioportal.xmlbeans
Class OntologyBean

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.ontoapi.bioportal.xmlbeans.OntologyBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Ontology
public class OntologyBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements Ontology

Wraps for the Ontology representation of BioPortal and maps it to the OntologyEntity interface.

Author:
$Id: ConceptBean.java 8301 2009-07-31 13:41:14Z tomasz $
